fields.name: Chess
fields.description: Chess is one of the oldest and most popular board games. It is played by two opponents on a checkered board, commonly white and black. The objective of the game is to capture the opponent's king.

fields.name: Star Wars: The Old Republic
fields.description: Multiplayer online role-playing game based in the Star Wars universe.

fields.name: RuneScape
fields.description: A fantasy massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed and published by Jagex, first released in January 2001
